```{r}
library(tidyverse)
library(rvest)
library(httr)
```

read data
```{r}
NYPD = 
  GET("https://data.cityofnewyork.us/resource/qgea-i56i.csv", 
      query = list("$limit" = 250000)) %>% 
  content("parsed")
```

```{r}
NYPD_clean = NYPD %>% 
  select(-cmplnt_num, -cmplnt_to_dt, -cmplnt_to_tm) %>% 
  filter(is.na(hadevelopt) == FALSE)
```
